lead_paragraph: Concerns over the future of the ailing Western Force were eased on Friday when the Australian Rugby Union announced an "alliance" with the Super Rugby franchise committed to keeping the team in Perth.

headline.print_headline: ARU 'Alliance' Secures Future for Western Force
headline.main: ARU 'Alliance' Secures Future for Western Force

snippet: Concerns over the future of the ailing Western Force were eased on Friday when the Australian Rugby Union announced an "alliance" with the Super Rugby franchise committed to keeping the team in Perth....
